metadata.title: CVE-2020-8647 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
There is a use-after-free vulnerability in the Linux kernel through 5.5.2in the vc_do_resize function in drivers/tty/vt/vt.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-8647` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-21-generic - 5.4.0-21.25
linux-image-5.4.0-21-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-21.25
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-21-generic - 5.4.0-21.25
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-21-lowlatency - 5.4.0-21.25
No subscription required

linux-image-5.4.0-1006-kvm - 5.4.0-1006.6
No subscription required

No subscription required
